body_html: So it seems like C11 atomics are just poorly supported in general. I think the best thing might just be to alter the C11 atomics check in the CMakeFile to include checking ATOMIC_INT_LOCK_FREE, and fall back to GCC atomics (which we already do in some cases) if they are not.

body: So it seems like C11 atomics are just poorly supported in general. I think the best thing might just be to alter the C11 atomics check in the CMakeFile to include checking ATOMIC_INT_LOCK_FREE, and fall back to GCC atomics (which we already do in some cases) if they are not.
